0: As always I was very satisfied with the service provided by the receptionists and maids
I called the front desk to complain and they moved us to a king room
The Staff was terrible slow and very unknowledgable
It seems like you might be on the right track to make it a better hotel for your guests and your employees
Generally the place was kind of sketchy but the staff at the desk was outstanding
The bed and tub seemed to be clean but there was mold on the floor the ceiling was cracked with paint chipping and falling in the window was cracked TV very old with bad reception
The staff were nice but the facility is very run down
EXTROIDANARY customer service goes a long way with me
The front desk was placed in a really funny place and informal
The front desk staff said the Hotel would be upgraded within the next year upon checkout
1: I was pleasantly surprised by my stay last night at the Trumbull and Porter hotel
The staff is quite friendly and helpful when looking for things to do in Detroit
But we had dinner there the night before on Thanksgiving and the food was really good and the service was excellent
The Trumbull and Porter Hotel was a fantastic mix of old and new
Great hotel the rooms were nicly done and the staff was amazing
The staff were friendly the room was clean and the distance from downtown was excellent
Corn hole and other yard games outside and staff was very helpful for recomending good local eats
The staff was so nice and helpful too
Beautifully decorated really good staff general nice feel to the hotel
We purchased a certificate to enjoy 1 evening of Wine Dine at Trumbull Porter
